channel.title: Changing what Npc options do. --Summoning---
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/xf9hsp.png[/img]
I want to add a actual dismiss so if you click dismiss the chosen summoning npc you have goes away. Also for graahk it has abyss option so how can i make that actually tele you somewhere. And last some summoning npcs have storing but how can i add a simple storing system whether it is just using it with the npc and it keep until to click again and then it puts back into your inventory. let me know for any of these

item.title: Changing what Npc options do. --Summoning---
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

I didn’t say npchandler, I said NPC clicking packets.
private void parseIncomingPackets() {
Those two cases should be in that void.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing what Npc options do. --Summoning---
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:5, topic:341813”]Whatever you make it do.

if (NPCID == #) { //Do the stuff.... }

his saying add the codes under the correct packets that he just gave you.
like for the “Abyss” one you will use

 p.teleportTo(3222, 3219, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);

pure, hes using a 317 ;)[/quote]
oh lmfao

toX = 1000; //[b]Kyles[/b] Hood toY = 1000; //[b]Kyles[/b] Hoodima go continue reading my fucking shitty guide on cpp.

Read full topic
